solution_line_template: {total_tickets_sold} x {fraction_came_before_numerator}/{fraction_came_before_denominator} = <<{total_tickets_sold}*{fraction_came_before_numerator}/{fraction_came_before_denominator}={came_before_start}>>{came_before_start} people came before the start of the concert.
{total_tickets_sold} - {came_before_start} = <<{total_tickets_sold}-{came_before_start}={did_not_come_before_start}>>{did_not_come_before_start} people did not come before the start of the concert.

{did_not_come_before_start} x {fraction_came_after_first_song_numerator}/{fraction_came_after_first_song_denominator} = <<{did_not_come_before_start}*{fraction_came_after_first_song_numerator}/{fraction_came_after_first_song_denominator}={came_after_first_song}>>{came_after_first_song} people came few minutes after the first song.

So, {came_after_first_song} + {arrived_middle_part} = <<{came_after_first_song}+{arrived_middle_part}={came_late_total}>>{came_late_total} people came to the concert that was not able to be at the start of the concert.
Therefore, {did_not_come_before_start} - {came_late_total} = <<{did_not_come_before_start}-{came_late_total}={did_not_go}>>{did_not_go} people did not go to the concert.
